news.title: 安德鲁丑闻成威廉未来国王的难题
news.title0: Andrew is Prince William's problem too - and it makes his future job harder
news.content: 安德鲁王子被捕事件持续发酵，分析指出这给未来国王威廉王子的工作带来巨大挑战，并可能损害王室声誉。
news.content0: School holidays are precious, protected time for the Prince and Princess of Wales.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 巴基斯坦空袭阿富汗致数十人死伤
news.title0: Pakistan launches strikes on Afghanistan, with Taliban saying dozens killed
news.content: 巴基斯坦对阿富汗境内目标发动空袭，塔利班称袭击造成数十人伤亡，包括妇女儿童。巴方称此举是对近期自杀式袭击的回应。
news.content0: Pakistan has carried out multiple overnight air strikes on Afghanistan, which the Taliban has said killed and wounded dozens of people, including women and children.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 伊朗学生举行大规模反政府抗议
news.title0: Iran students stage first large anti-government protests since deadly crackdown
news.content: 伊朗多所大学学生举行反政府抗议活动，这是自上月当局血腥镇压以来的首次大规模集会。
news.content0: Students at several universities in Iran have staged anti-government protests - the first such rallies on this scale since last month's deadly crackdown by the authorities.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普将全球关税提高至15%
news.title0: Trump says he will increase his new global tariffs to 15%
news.content: 美国总统特朗普宣布，将把新的全球进口关税税率从10%提高至15%，以回应最高法院此前推翻其关税政策的裁决。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has said he will impose global tariffs of 15%, as he has continued to rail against a Supreme Court ruling that struck down his previous import taxes.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普政策蓝图“2025计划”过半已实施
news.title0: From Venezuela to immigration crackdown, Project 2025 provided Trump's roadmap
news.content: 分析显示，特朗普第二任期过半政策与保守派智库“遗产基金会”制定的“2025计划”蓝图相符，包括移民打击和外交转向。
news.content0: When Donald Trump gives his State of the Union address on Tuesday evening, he is expected to tout his policies from his first year back in the White House.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 研究质疑英国Z世代“宗教复兴”数据
news.title0: We thought Gen Z had started going to church in droves. But the truth is more complicated
news.content: 一份报告称英国Z世代涌向教堂，但专家质疑其调查方法，其他数据显示基督教长期衰退趋势未变。
news.content0: When Jay Painter's grandfather died in May 2024, the 27-year-old from Wiltshire felt he saw his soul leave his body.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 俄前出租车司机被指策划欧洲破坏行动
news.title0: The Ex-Taxi Driver at the Center of Russia’s Shadow War
news.content: 西方安全官员称，一名俄罗斯前出租车司机在俄情报部门协助下，策划了针对波兰、立陶宛等欧洲多国的破坏行动。
news.content0: The plots, say Western security officials, are part of a shadow war by Russia’s intelligence services. An arson attack that destroyed more than 1,000 businesses outside Warsaw. Another that burned an IKEA in Lithuania. A plan to put incendiary devices on cargo planes in Britain, Germany and Poland.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 加州雪崩致九名滑雪者遇难
news.title0: Close friends and sisters among nine skiers killed in California avalanche
news.content: 美国加州发生雪崩，九名越野滑雪者遇难，其中包括六位关系密切的朋友和母亲。恶劣天气阻碍了救援。
news.content0: Six close friends and mothers are among the nine off-piste skiers who were killed in an avalanche in California.
news.author: Sky News

news.title: 挪威速滑老将40岁再夺奥运金牌
news.title0: For Dutch speedskater, age doesn’t matter.
news.content: 40岁的荷兰速滑名将伯格兹马在冬奥会男子集体出发项目中夺冠，为荷兰男子项目赢得本届赛事首金。
news.author: NYTimes
